title: Manage Player Injury Status
description: A player gets injured during a game. The medical staff needs to update their status and create a recovery plan.

tasks.description: Log the injury details (e.g., type, severity, date) in the player's medical record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new injury record.

tasks.description: Update the player's official status on the team roster to 'Injured'.
Based on the injury type, generate a standard rehabilitation plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a day-by-day recovery and therapy plan for the player.
